Bolivar Schools Update:
On Monday March 23rd we will be getting back into the process of feeding our students breakfast and lunch on weekdays. To accomplish this we will take the following steps:

1. Both breakfast and lunch will be prepared in the building cafeterias
2. Meals will be loaded onto Bolivar School District Buses
3. Starting at 8:00 am regular bus routes will be run, going to each bus stop and delivering daily meals to any student in Bolivar School District
4. If students do not ride a bus, have the students looking for a bus between 8:00am and 9:00am so they can get the meals. These meals are free and will not be charged to anyones account

We are going to need understanding and flexibility during this initial running. This is a first for us!

For additional information please visit: https://bolivarschools.org/cms/One.aspx?portalId=133975&pageId=29618816

text:
Bolivar Schools Update:
On Monday March 23rd we will be getting back into the process of feeding our students breakfast and lunch on weekdays. To accomplish this we will take the following steps:

1. Both breakfast and lunch will be prepared in the building cafeterias
2. Meals will be loaded onto Bolivar School District Buses
3. Starting at 8:00 am regular bus routes will be run, going to each bus stop and delivering daily meals to any student in Bolivar School District
4. If students do not ride a bus, have the students looking for a bus between 8:00am and 9:00am so they can get the meals. These meals are free and will not be charged to anyones account

We are going to need understanding and flexibility during this initial running. This is a first for us!

For additional information please visit: https://bolivarschools.org/cms/One.aspx?portalId=133975&pageId=29618816
